div.p: HSE21 is the teaching and learning framework in HSE schools. Learn more about how HSE21 is preparing our students for the future.

img.alt: Student showing his ipad with his work on it

div.p: HSE utilizes a 1:1 model of technology integration. Learn more about how digital devices in our schools foster collaboration, creativity, communication, and critical thinking.

div.style: background-color: red; color: white; font-weight: bold; display: block;
div.div: UPDATE (4.2.20) Gov. Holcomb has ordered all schools to remain closed through the end of the school year to help protect Hoosiers from COVID-19. Check for new updates on our COVID-19 Information web page.

div.h5: A Quick Guide to School Enrollment at HSE Schools

div.h4: A Quick Guide to School Enrollment at HSE Schools
div.p: HSE Schools will open up enrollment for the 2020 – 2021 school year on or after January 21st 2020.
Hamilton Southeastern Schools is ready to welcome the next class of young learners.

div.p: Hamilton Southeastern Schools, as a forward-thinking school district, provides educational opportunities to ensure the success of each and every student, to become a responsible citizen and to positively influence an ever-changing world community.
